channel.title: Week 9 on Fernando's Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Week 9 on Fernando's Hub

item.title: Hands-On: Applying Lean Methodology to Your Business with GenAI
item.description: Discover how to apply Lean Methodology to a business using GenAI to iterate quickly, validate assumptions, and improve efficiency.

item.title: How Businesses Use GenAI: Marketing, Support, and Innovation
item.description: Learn how small businesses use GenAI for marketing, customer support, and product development. Explore practical applications and pitfalls, emphasizing the importance of iteration to achieve high-quality results.
